about_the_game:
Equipment
Equipment is the key to your success. Your gear consists of anything from a basic flashlight to land mines and weapons. Use various guns to bring down the dinosaur and setup traps to maintain the advantage during a encounter.

Maps
Visit multiple locations, and explore beautiful landscapes. Be on the lookout for points of interest to find loot and shelter.

Loot
Find loot scatttered around the map, loot has random spawn locations in order to make each match different. Items to find can range from medkits and adrenaline boosts to weapons such as assault rifles, shotguns and more. Weapons can also be customized with attachments that can be found around the map.

name: Primal Hunt
short_description: Primal Hunt is a solo/co-op dinosaur hunting game. You're dropped of at a remote location were your goal is to hunt down a dinosaur. Explore the map and look for new weapons, ammo, traps and various equipment to make your hunt for the dinosaur easier.
